name: Zephyrus Shadowthorn
description: Zephyrus Shadowthorn, a human warlock, was raised in the grand library of a secluded monastery, where he served as an acolyte. His alignment as lawful good was developed through years of strict adherence to the monastery's teachings and principles. However, during his studies, Zephyrus stumbled upon an ancient tome filled with forbidden knowledge and unlocked a pact with a celestial patron, granting him otherworldly powers. Now, wielding both the wisdom of a scholar and the eldritch might of a warlock, Zephyrus has set out on a quest to use his newfound abilities for the greater good, seeking to rid the world of darkness and restore balance.
